text: Hagi anantera Mataniakino Mataniana Mika kasentegeno, Mikana Zabdi kasentegeno, Zabdina Asapu kasente'ne. Ana hu'neankino Matania'a, Ra Anumzamofo mono nompima zagame'ma nehaza vahetema ugota huzmante'nege'za Anumzamofoma susu hunte mono'ma nehaza zupama nunamuma hutege'za mono'ma nehaza ne' manine. Higeno agri'ma azama nehia ne' Bakbuki'a agranena Jerusalemi kumapi mani'ne. Hagi anantera mago nera Abdakino Abdana Samua kasentegeno, Samuana Galali kasentegeno, Galalina Jedutuni kasente'ne.
